MEMORANDUM AND ORDER
PRESKA, District Judge:
This is an action alleging securities fraud, common law fraud, negligent misrepresentation, and fraudulent conveyance in connection with a complex transaction involving the plaintiffs' provision of financing to facilitate the purchase of stock and assets of a group of related businesses allegedly owned or controlled by the various defendants. Defendants Motor Parkway, Inc., Melvin Smith, Stuart Stein, Louis Ligator, Allison Industries, Inc., Allison Industries, Ltd., and Hybritex of Costa Rica, S.A. have brought four different motions to dismiss, relying on Fed.
